question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-model/src/constant_folder.rs] [Function: checked_shl()] [u16 Conversion Loss] Since checked_shl uses to_u16() to convert the shift amount, can shift values >= 65536 silently fail conversion and return None without proper error diagnostics, causing constants to be rejected incorrectly?
